TextView.android:text: Select characters and pass the pone around so everyone knows their role. Once everyone knows their role, narrator will wake up mafias(can kill 1 person), police(can suspect one person) and doctor(can save one person) one by one. Once that has been done, everyone wakes up debates until everyone comes to a conclusion of eliminating one person from the game by voting. The game continues till mafias win or lose
